title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4250.1 - Research fund created
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4250.1 - Research fund created

State Regulations

Pursuant to section 701 of the Racing, Pari-Mutuel

Wagering and Breeding Law, a fund for the promotion of equine research is
hereby created in the New York State Veterinary College at Cornell, as a
regents approved veterinary college facility of a land grant university within
this State. The fund is hereby designated the "Harry M. Zweig Memorial Fund for

Equine Research" in honor of the late Harry M. Zweig, D.V.M. The monetary
assets of the fund shall be used for equine research conducted by the State

Veterinary College pursuant to the rules and regulations of the State Gaming

Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4250.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
